overview: Over one hour of never before seen rare machines. Commentary by pinball visionaries like Steve Kordek, Roger Sharpe and historian Richard Bueschel. Celebrity interviews with Slash former lead guitarist from Guns and Roses, Areosmith’s Joe Perry, and future MLB Hall of Famer, Frank Thomas.
tagline: Everybody’s played the game, but nobody knows the story!
title: The History of Pinball
